comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Might be Mrs Albert B. Cummins. See picture at digitalgallery.nypl.org/nypldigital/id?1219509 Cummins was Governor of Iowa and then a U. S. Senator. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Albert_B._Cummins If so, she is the former Miss Ida L Gallery. See, for example, www.pa-roots.org/data/read.php?411,411080 and uipress.lib.uiowa.edu/bdi/DetailsPage.aspx?id=83 indicates she was Ida Lucette Gallery.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Here's another picture of Mrs. Cummins that is probably the same woman. Good housekeeping, Volume 36, n 6, June 1903 books.google.com/books?id=aG2UHazGRlIC&pg=PA505&l...; And this one, from the Midwestern in 1908, definitely looks to be the same woman: books.google.com/books?id=hrMRAAAAYAAJ&pg=RA2-PA21&am...

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: swanq: Thanks for finding more information on Mrs. Cummins.  We'll include some of it next time we update the description.
